title: Digital-Based Future-Oriented Language Learning Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic digital tools and foundational language education knowledge
context.additional_context: Workshop for strengthening learner-centered digital education design competencies. Includes a Carpe Diem-style process where participants directly design language learning modules and receive feedback

learning_goals: Participants can design learner-customized language learning scenarios using digital tools.
Participants can improve language education design based on peer feedback in a PBL (Project-Based Learning) environment.
Participants can propose mobile/technology-integrated language education strategies aligned with future educational trends.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
